generation_details.prompt_used: Generate a realistic photographic selfie of a single person, front-facing, entire head and shoulders visible, centered, eye-level camera, neutral background, evenly lit, eyes open, no occlusions, no hands or objects blocking the face. Apply the following specific skin details: Front-facing portrait with pronounced, well-defined hyperpigmented patches (melasma and post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation) on cheeks and forehead; distinct, irregular edges with realistic variation in tone (medium to dark brown), visible pores and natural skin texture showing through; avoid muddy smears; soft even lighting for clinical clarity. The person should be a elderly male with fair skin tone.
